includedAssets.title: Season 5
includedAssets.synopsis: Castle and Beckett re-evaluate their new relationship, while continuing to uncover secrets in the conspiracy surrounding Beckett’s mother’s death. Nathan Fillion and Stana Katic are the unlikely detective duo in the hit show’s fifth season.

includedIn.title: Castle
includedIn.synopsis: After he is asked to help investigate real-life murders copied from his best-selling series, author Rick Castle shadows the NYPD’s Detective Kate Beckett as research for his next book.
